definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: jing1 shen2 xing4 yan4 shi2 zheng4

sentences.english: You are all divine sparks and divine creators.
sentences.chinese: 你全是神性之光和神聖創造者。

sentences.english: Man has to wake up from the sleep of ignorance and realize his divine essence.
sentences.chinese: 人必須從無明之眠中醒來，意識到他的神性本質。

sentences.english: Multiple studies have shown a relationship between spirituality and the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 多項研究已表明在精神性和免疫系統之間的關係。
我是如此崇敬汝之神性。

sentences.english: It either serves the Krist or it serves its opposite.
sentences.chinese: 它要不就服務神性，或者神性的反方。

sentences.english: It either serves the Krist or it serves its opposite.
sentences.chinese: 它要不就服務神性，或者神性的反方。

sentences.english: Tear aside the veils and see the divine majesty of your own Self.
sentences.chinese: 用你的真我本性撕開無明面紗，看到神奇的神性。

sentences.english: But your god-self does not dwell alone in your being.
sentences.chinese: 然而你們的身上並非只有神性存在。

sentences.english: You must strengthen and learn to listen to your own inner Divine sense.
sentences.chinese: 你們必須增強並學習傾聽你們自己內在的神性感官。

sentences.english: He worries about his spirituality and then skewers his fellow campers.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心自己的精神性，然後又譏諷他的營友。

sentences.english: Classic : Man exists in erotic tension toward the divine ground of his existence.
sentences.chinese: 人活在一種對其存在的神性根基的愛慾的緊張中。

sentences.english: Saying "I love you"is the open sesame to experience the Divine.
sentences.chinese: 說“我愛你”是打開神性之門的咒語。

sentences.english: This case your child may also be the spirit of frequent urination .
sentences.chinese: 您孩子這種情況也可能是精神性尿頻。

sentences.english: Divine Storm no longer uses Holy Power.
sentences.chinese: 神性風暴不再消耗聖能。

sentences.english: The goal of spiritual discipline is the rediscovery of his true identity with the divine Reality.
sentences.chinese: 靈性訓練的主旨是讓他重新發現自己與神性合爲一體。

sentences.english: That divinity , if it exists, is the invention of thought.
sentences.chinese: 那神性，如果它存在，就是思想的發明。

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
